title: Gamification-Enhanced Intensive Short-Term Course for University-Level Mathematical Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of college-level foundational mathematics (linear algebra, calculus)
context.additional_context: Real-time online course conducted in a digital device-supported environment. Focuses on improving mathematical problem-solving skills using game elements. Parallels practical math application cases for job seekers.

learning_goals: In game-based learning environments, 85% or more of learners can independently complete 70% or more of assigned math quests
Can develop three or more customized learning scenarios according to gamification design principles
Can apply math problem-solving strategies utilizing game mechanics (experience points, leveling up, reward systems) five or more times
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
